backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, habits, records, monthly targets, and investment goals with access‑controlled CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two habit‑tracking features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point including the root mount element and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling authentication, profile setup, and rendering the tracker dashboard within an error boundary and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/CollapsibleHabit: UI panel that toggles visibility of the HabitManager inside a collapsible container.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component rendering a custom fallback on unhandled errors.
frontend/src/components/FatalErrorFallba: Fallback UI displayed on fatal errors with reload and retry options.
frontend/src/components/HabitGrid.tsx: Interactive habit grid that displays day‑level completions, handles toggles and amount edits, and filters records by month/year.
frontend/src/components/HabitManager.tsx: Manages creating, editing, and deleting habits with validation for units, weekly targets, and default amounts.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with user info, view switching, theme toggle, and logout menu.
frontend/src/components/InvestmentGoalCa: Displays an investment goal with editing, deletion, progress tracking, and contribution logging.
Lists investment goals and provides a form to create new ones.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Provides the login UI using Internet Identity with branding and loading state.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyTargetsEd: Shows monthly totals for applicable habits by summing records and formatting amounts based on unit.
frontend/src/components/MonthTabs.tsx: Renders horizontally scrollable month tabs and notifies when the selected month changes.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form component allowing users to enter and save their name, using a mutation hook and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/ProgressCharts.t: Displays monthly habit progress with charts, selecting habits with completions and computing stats for visualizations.
frontend/src/components/ReportExportDial: Dialog for exporting habit data as CSV, supporting date ranges and selecting specific habits with validation and async export calls.
frontend/src/components/TrackerDashboard: Main dashboard showing habits, records, charts, and investment view, managing month selection, loading states, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, including login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, habits, and related data via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark theme design tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for jspdf types.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Utilities to parse free‑text durations into seconds and format seconds into compact duration strings.
frontend/src/utils/fileDownload.ts: Generates export filenames based on date ranges.
frontend/src/utils/habitUnit.ts: Helpers for converting, labeling, and identifying habit unit types, including custom units like km.
frontend/src/utils/reportCsv.ts: Builds CSV export data for habits and records and provides a browser download helper.
frontend/src/utils/reportDateRange.ts: Converts dates to UTC components and formats them for reporting.
frontend/src/utils/reportPdf.ts: Empty placeholder for PDF report utilities.
frontend/src/utils/reportStats.ts: Computes report statistics for habits, including completion percentages, daily stats, and volume data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and managing URL and session parameters for routing and persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking schema version, issues, feature requests, and requirements for fixing monthly habit totals and persistence.
